description: Places i love. The food is super tasty and memorable. Also very healthy.
keywords: Fish dishes,Pescatarian,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Sardines Spanish Style Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 red onion, pickled (to taste ie red onion left in white vinegar and pinch sugar for 20 minutes)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oven to 280°C (fan forced, maybe 300°C if not) and select grill function. Put a sheet of foil on a tray suited to the oven and spray it with canola (or other) oil.
Leave heads and tails on sardines but gut and clean them, wash too, of course. Slash on both sides. Lay them on the foil and cook 3-4 mins each side with butter slices on top.
In the meanwhile wash some green salad leaves and drain. Mix 1 tbsp lemon juice with 1 tbsp red wine vinegar and 3 drops Tabasco sauce in a small container and shake to mix.
Assemble, with Woolies medium salsa and eat!
